Text: thx! any chance we could get the deck keys or some other fix to unlock all the decks? it is way too tedious and time-consuming to play 300+ matches to unlock all the cards in the decks.

I'm using the THETA release, the SE.

I also applied the 2 available updates on Rlslog. Search for "magic the gathering" on the site.

For me, the decks were completely unlocked once I plugged the files into the game directory.

I never needed the unlock keys.
I just remembered, if you go to "Deck Manager" and click "unlock deck" then quit and restart the game, it should unlock the full deck. I did have to do that for some of them.
i dl both of your deck pack , but i think this one is deck pack 4 , and the other one is pack 2 and 3 because of the file name , how about pack 1 ? and does this mean this is the Ravnica expansion?
Yes. The Ravnica expansion is in a THETA update on Rlslog. That's the 2013 Expansion on Steam.
Just to be clear, since the Return to Ravnica expansion was in one of the earlier THETA releases, it's not included in the deck packs here.
